input.sentences: where nature is taking back it 's home .
the graffiti of the old civilization
still lives on | though | but nature is slowly taking it back .
output.sentences: The abandoned city sat lonely and desolate.
The wind whistled through the streets and down through the tunnels.
Nature had taken over after the last of the humans left.
The only remaining signs of humanity were the abandoned cars and remnants of graffiti long forgotten.
Even the graffiti was slowly fading from nature's relentless growth.
